pageContext.claim: “Remember during the debates, everyone wanted to re-adjust your Social Security, let's add some years on, listen. Who is the one person that said I'm not touching entitlements? Thank you. Thank you. And remember I said, right, and I haven't, I haven't.”
pageContext.analysis: Under Trump, the date for when the Medicare Hospital Insurance (Part A) trust fund will be depleted keeps advancing. The current projection is 2026, three years earlier than the projection a year earlier. If the trust fund is depleted, that means the government would not be able to cover 100 percent of estimated expenses. Plus, Republican leadership has floated Social Security reform.
